name: Biogen
overview: The world is on the brink of nuclear catastrophe, a group of scientists, aware of the end of humanity, they decide to save the DNA information of all species on earth on a floppy disk and hide it in an underground base, next to the computer with which it can be read. As the second part of their plan, they launched a space probe, “the zx voyager I ”, to travel through the vastness of space, in which saved the location on earth of said secret base, hoping to that one day it would be found by a more advanced civilization and they could, Using that information, recreate all the species on earth, including the human being. And this is where our hero, Roswell Jones, an intrepid adventurer-space archaeologist, originally from the planet "Z80" located in the extreme opposite of the Milky Way, which one day meets the space probe and He immediately decides to go to retrieve the information, as soon as he arrives he discovers that, Unfortunately, the nuclear war was consummated and only beasts remain on earth extremely violent mutants, the task of getting to the information will not be a walk.
